text: Fred fixed his small eyes on his brother, beckoned him to stand closer, and whispered into his ear the most unexpected words Nick had ever heard."I'm going to get myself married," Fred said. The next day he brought home a woman in her middle thirties and took her straight to his mother's bedside.
